entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for automatic inference from runtime concepts to OpenAPI annotations #44232
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor - Title attribute in SVG is picked up by HeadOutlet #44231
  • Option to have area views without an areas folder #44223
  • Improve the error message when applying [FromXX] on parameters that don't support binding #44218
  • Tag Helpers not working in published site #44216

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm GetAuthenticationStateAsync question #44228
  • EF Core IdentityDbContext UserStore Issue when not deriving from IdentityDbContext #12511
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] component inheritance, rendering logic in base component #21664
    Backlog
  • .NET 7.0.0-rc1 ASP.NET Core Hosting Bundle fails to install x64 runtime/ANCM on Server 2016 #44113
    7.0.0
  • ASP.NET CORE 3.1 Default Authentication Policy executing last when combined with other policies #18961
    7.0.0
  • Suggestion: Adding Directive #5607
    Backlog
  • Include .SCSS as a first-class citizen (particularly in projects using the Razor editor) #24420
    Backlog
  • Supporting customizing query params in redirect URL for OpenID auth #20813
    7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Bring back stateful prerendering #15317
    Backlog
  • Add an auth sample for cookies + bearer #4118
    Backlog
  • BindingAddress handles bad ports poorly #44208
  • Investigate tooling to migrate from NET Fx to .NET Core #27215
    Backlog
  • Virtualize component: Add a method to scroll to an item #44219
  • `dotnet-getdocument` fails to resolve GetDocument.Insider for net7.0 #44119
    7.0.0
  • How to properly destroy javascript component and avoid JSDisconnectedException #44180
  • Document why using IHttpContextAccessor is discouraged #27392
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to an 8.0.100-alpha SDK #44234
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Move to an RTM SDK #44233
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Remove VS nupkg push #44230
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Microsoft.OpenApi dependency to 1.4.3 #44229
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Add support for minimal APIs in ApiDescription.Server #44227
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44220
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Turn HTTP/3 on by default in Kestrel #44217
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [7.0] Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44207
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix junit output test file on timeout #44213
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Route tooling redux #44077
  • Read HTTP_PORTS and HTTPS_PORTS into IServerAddresses #44194
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Try Win11 arm queue #44118
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2006380 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
